description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6s9dr","text":"The protocol outlines how to aliquot PCR Master Mix for 5µL miniaturized amplification of 16S gene in 384-well format using the epMotion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"1sn4u","text":"Please wear at least the minimum required personal protective equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q9hu","text":"Ensure that all necessary kit components are available as well as user-supplied consumables.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6nvv","text":"Remove nuclease and nucleotide contamination from work surfaces and instruments prior to starting using an appropriate solution, such as RNase AWAY™ (Thermo Scientific™ catalogue: 700511), followed by wiping with 70% to 100% molecular biology grade ethanol to remove additional contaminants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials.reagent_name: Platinum Hot Start PCR Master Mix (2x)

Motion Racks 1- 50 µL w/filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj9qf","text":"(1) epMotion reservoir 10mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6657","text":"(3) twin.tec PCR Plate 384","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hrgv","text":"Platinum Hor Start PCR Master Mix 2X","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"a2hfn","text":"In a sterile 10mL reservoir, add 2,534\u00a0\u03bcl of Platinum Hot Start PCR 2X Master Mix and 3,295 \u00b5L of PCR Clean Water per set of 384 samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b779n","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":2,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"eiqc2","text":"Mix pipette.
